alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 12 at 3:00AM PST until December 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 65 to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains and San Diego County Deserts. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected along the mountain ridges and on the upper desert slope areas.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains
